id.kaytrust.core.credential.base

Interface CredentialIssuer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EthereumCredentialIssuer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EthereumCredentialIssuerImpl

    public interface CredentialIssuer
    This interface defines the required method to issue a verifiable credential.
    Author:
    Edgard Espinoza, Erick Pacheco

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> String issueCredential(T subjectCredential, String[] credentialType, Date issuanceDate, Date expirationDate, ProofTypeBuilder proof, String id, String issuer)
      issues a verifiable credential whose hash must be registered permanently in a DLT for verification purposes.
      String revoke(String credential, String issuer)
      Revoke credential

    • Method Detail

      • issueCredential

        <T> String issueCredential(T subjectCredential,
                           String[] credentialType,
                           Date issuanceDate,
                           Date expirationDate,
                           ProofTypeBuilder proof,
                           String id,
                           String issuer)
                    throws MnidInvalidAddressException,
                           IOException,
                           org.web3j.protocol.exceptions.TransactionException,
                           ParamEmptyException,
                           CapabilityException
        issues a verifiable credential whose hash must be registered permanently in a DLT for verification purposes.

        Type Parameters:
        T - This is the type parameter
        Parameters:
        subjectCredential - Example: 
         
 "credentialSubject": {
     "@id": "did:example:abcd",
     "name": "John Doe",
     "birthdate": "2018-01-01"
   }
        credentialType - Example: 
         
 Example
["VerifiableCredential", "DisputeCredential"]
        issuanceDate - represents the initial time from which the credential is valid
        expirationDate - represents the time after which the credential wont be valid-
        proof - The proofType implementation that attach the proof section to the credential.
        id - id of credential, can be blank
        issuer - DID who emit the credential, The Decentralized identifier
        Returns:
        credential format json
        Throws:
        IOException - network exception
        MnidInvalidAddressException - mnid format error
        org.web3j.protocol.exceptions.TransactionException - transaction in blockchain error.
        ParamEmptyException - if a required parameter is empty.
        CapabilityException - capability no present
        See Also:
        credentialSubject

      • revoke

        String revoke(String credential,
              String issuer)
       throws MnidInvalidAddressException,
              IOException,
              org.web3j.protocol.exceptions.TransactionException,
              ParamEmptyException,
              CapabilityException
        Revoke credential
        Parameters:
        credential - credential
        issuer - DID who revoke a credential, The Decentralized identifier
        Returns:
        hash transaction
        Throws:
        IOException - network exception
        MnidInvalidAddressException - mnid format error
        org.web3j.protocol.exceptions.TransactionException - transaction in blockchain error.
        ParamEmptyException - if a required parameter is empty.
        CapabilityException - capability no present
        See Also:
        credentialSubject
